ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoFreeProductMaxValueExceeded
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: You have exceeded the max quantity #maxQuantityValue# allowed for #productName#.
ValidationMessage.comment: The number of free products added from a reward must be lower

ValidationMessage.name: CasSdoFreeProductTotalMaxValueExceeded
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: You have exceeded the max quantity allowed for the reward.
ValidationMessage.comment: The total number of free items added from areward must be lower
